bibl.title: A Ptolemaic Inscription Rediscovered.
bibl.note: Ed.: Max L. Strack, Inschriften aus ptolemäischer Zeit II, ArchPF 2 (1903) p. 548, No. 26 [not included in S.E.G. nor in S.B.]. Now in the British Museum, Department of Ancient Egypt & Sudan, Inv. EA 515. - Front: Ptolemaic dedication to Hermes and Herakles. Terenouthis, 186-180 BC. - Back: Augustan funerary inscription. 31 October 10 AD.
bibl.seg: Mario C.D. Paganini, A Ptolemaic Inscription Rediscovered.

Ed.: Max L. Strack, Inschriften aus ptolemäischer Zeit II, ArchPF 2 (1903) p. 548, No. 26 [not included in S.E.G. nor in S.B.]. Now in the British Museum, Department of Ancient Egypt & Sudan, Inv. EA 515. - Front: Ptolemaic dedication to Hermes and Herakles. Terenouthis, 186-180 BC. - Back: Augustan funerary inscription. 31 October 10 AD.
